title: AI Content Detection Policies
description: Enforce content policies by detecting AI-generated submissions and ensuring compliance with platform guidelines
prompt:
Please analyze the provided content for:
1. Indicators of AI generation
2. Policy compliance issues
3. Required disclosures or missing attributions

Provide a detailed report including:
- AI detection confidence score
- Policy violation alerts
- Recommended actions
- Suggested improvements for compliance
example:
Input: A blog post submission
Output Analysis:
- AI Detection: 87% likelihood of AI generation
- Policy Issues Found:
  * Missing AI disclosure statement
  * No attribution for quoted material
- Required Actions:
  * Add AI content disclosure
  * Include proper citations
  * Update metadata tags
- Recommendations:
  * Add human editorial review
  * Include original research/insights
  * Clearly mark AI-assisted sections
author: GooseAI Team

policy_rules.description: JSON object containing specific platform policy rules to check

detection_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for AI detection (0-1)
